roleset.name: (cause to) become thicker
roleset.note: THICKEN-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. (from thicken.01-v)
THICKENED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from thickened.01-j)

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Watching, they waited until the squall thickened and began to move in a long drifting slant across the dry burning land.

example.name: accusative
example.text: For a moment, anger darkened the hallway about her, and when she found her voice, anger thickened it.

example.name: instrumental
example.text: John thickened the gravy with library paste.

roleset.name: crowded/dense (location/components)
roleset.note: THICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from thick.01-j)

role.descr: crowded with what; close together components (the trees)

example.name: both args
example.text: The Swamp itself was thick with trees and vines.

example.name: both args
example.text: The air was thick with smoke

example.name: both args
example.text: His voice was thick with emotion

example.name: interpretation: close together
example.text: The vines were as thick as the hair on a dog.

example.name: human as LOC of hairs
example.text: Dad was thick-haired, bowlegged, bottom-heavy; he wore a tangly, hircine beard; a cigar depended from his lips at all times, the aromatic stub of a flute;

roleset.name: dense/wide (possessor/attribute)
roleset.note: THICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from thick.02-j)

role.descr: dense thing, or thing with a wide diameter
more specific aspect of arg1 that is thick/dense (if in addition)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Soon the vines were as thick as saplings.

example.name: wide diameter
example.text: He was thick of frame, heavy with muscle, yet accustomed to going without in the face of plenty.

roleset.name: not very smart
roleset.note: THICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from thick.03-j)

role.descr: not very smart one (may require concatenation)

example.name: concatenation
example.text: Of course, he was thick to believe that James would want to hang around them.
example.arg: [he] [to believe that James would want to hang around them]

roleset.name: socially close
roleset.note: THICK-J NOTES: Added by Julia. (from thick.04-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Those kids were as thick as thieves.

example.name: both args
example.text: Mr. Oliver observed that Mr. Bailey and Mr. Wodiska were "thick" with each other.
